title: Definition
text: A hypothesis is a hypothesis a tentative explanation and can be investigated by experimentation. A law states a consistently observed phenomenon and can be used for prediction. A theory is a widely accepted explanation of the behavior of matter.

title: Scenario
text: The scenario given refers to Amontons's law. Ee can directly utilize it to determine how the pressure or temperature will behave in regards to the other. It is easily observed and tested. Based on this, select the answer.
